item.title: Huawei E5331
item.description:
Php 2,950.00
Checkout with Multiply: 
http://widgetcity.multiply.com/
Yes
Specification

Huawei E5331 Mobile WiFi (hereinafter referred to as the E5331) is a high-speed packet access mobile hotspot. It is a multi-mode wireless terminal for SOHO (Small Office and Home Office) and business professionals.

You can connect the E5331 with the USB interface of a computer, or connect the E5331 with the Wi-Fi. In the service area of ​​the HSPA + / HSPA / UMTS / EDGE / GPRS / GSM network, you can surf the Internet and send / receive messages / emails cordlessly. The E5331 is fast, reliable, and easy to operate. Thus, mobile users can experience many new features and services with the E5331. These features and services will enable a large number of users to use the E5331 and the average revenue per user (ARPU) of operators will increase substantially.

Main Features:
HSPA + (DL) data, service of up to 21 Mbit / s 
HSPA + (UL) data SERVICE of up to 5.76 Mbit / s 
HSDPA (DL) data SERVICE of up to 14.4 Mbit / s 
HSUPA (UL) data SERVICE of up to 5.76 Mbit / s the 
UMTS data service of up to 384 kbit / s the 
EDGE data service of up to 236.8 kbit / s the 
GPRS data service of up to 85.6 kbit / s 
PS domain data SERVICE based on UMTS and GSM 
SMS based on the CS / PS domain of GSM and UMTS, 
Wi-Fi 
Built-in DHCP Server, DNS RELAY and NAT 
Plug and Play (PnP) 
USB Extension Cable, easy to connect 
Standard Micro USB interface 
LED indicators

Built-in UMTS and WLAN high gain antenna 

 

Php 2,950.00
item.dc:creator: martin

item.title: Huawei E355
item.description:
Php 2,450.00
Checkout with Multiply: 
http://widgetcity.multiply.com/
Yes
Specifiction

Huawei E355 Spec Sheet

3G – HSPA+/UMTS; 2G – EDGE/GPRS/GSM
Speed: Up to 7.2 Mbps
Storage: microSD card supported up to 32GB
Dimension: 90.6 × 28.6 × 12.6mm
Weight: 40 grams

Php 2,450.00

 

Huawei E355 is a mobile wifi device that allows you to connect up to 5 devices. This device requires you to have a sim card and a power source and promises fast internet connection for your internet needs(up to 7Mbps speed).

To clarrify things up, Huawei Doesnt have built in battery. it needs to be plug to a power outlet ,Power banks,portable battery tubes or power tube in order to use it.(power adaptor sold seperately)
